name: DynaTools
description:
DynaTools is a comprehensive group of nodes to perform day by day activities:
- Selection
- Parameters extraction
- Database connection
- Collectors
- MEP Tools
- Civil Tools
- QAQC
- ViewTools

and many others.
The package is constantly growing so, come and see if there's a new version with new tools available

New nodes available:
- New QAQC package available

Documented issues:
- SplitDuctByPoints: create different systems
contents:
AxisByExcel - No description provided, CheckListParameters - Check parameters availability within the project.
The list can be imported from an excel file or just as a list of string., DetailGroup - No description provided, FileInfo - No description provided, InverseScore - No description provided, JetGroutingBySection - No description provided, LinkedCADFile - Check the number of CAD drawings linked or imported, LinkedRevit - No description provided, ListOfViewByType - No description provided, ModelGroup - No description provided, ParameterBinding - Check whether a parameter is correctly associated to a list of categories, ParametersMatrixFromExcel - No description provided, ScheduleOnSheet - No description provided, Score - Score a number against another, using a KPI maximum value, ViewOnSheet - No description provided
